TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit IOException extends System.SystemException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when an I/O error occurs.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IO.IOException> is the base class for exceptions thrown while accessing information using streams, files and directories.
The Base Class Library includes the following types, each of which is a derived class of `IOException` :
- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException>
- <xref:System.IO.EndOfStreamException>
- <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>
- <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException>
- <xref:System.IO.PathTooLongException>
Where appropriate, use these types instead of IOException.
<xref:System.IO.IOException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_IO which has the value 0x80131620.
## Examples This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Lock%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
[!code-cpp[System.IO.FileStream3#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileStream3/CPP/fstreamlock.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.FileStream3#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileStream3/CS/fstreamlock.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IO.FileStream3#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileStream3/VB/fstreamlock.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with its message string set to the empty string (""), its HRESULT set to COR_E_IO, and its inner exception set to a null reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "An I/O error occurred while performing the requested operation." This message takes into account the current system culture.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of message is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with its message string set to , its HRESULT set to COR_E_IO, and its inner exception set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance using `message`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The data for serializing or deserializing the object.
The source and destination for the object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified serialization and context information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
For more information on inner exceptions, see <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, int32 hresult) cil managed

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of message is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
An integer identifying the error that has occurred.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with its message string set to and its HRESULT user-defined.
